title: Launch client running super slow, lag when changing champions
body: Hi Riot, This only started happening since yesterday but I've been having extremely slow login and once I've logged in (like 10 mins later), my client doesn't show anything but friend list and the tool bar at the top. I tried to go to my match history or other pages but it just show them. Also I tried to spectate my friends' play but it won't connect to it. And today I can't even click the 'play' button. Lastly, ever since yesterday when I play on my client the images glitches, such as last second my it seemed that my ability didn't hit anything and next second it shows that its been hit, or when I'm walking my character just glitched and 'jumped' to the next place. PLEASE TELL ME HOW TO FIX IT!!!
